content: > **please note ** the graph for this > pattern is free to view in its > entirety on my blog this ad-free > downloadable pdf enables me to be able > to bring you more free patterns in the > future go to the free graphs and assembly instructions here 2 **description ** create an ode to your favorite furry friends with this fun and colorful c2c blanket in this design 16 individual squares are seamed together in a fun checkerboard pattern to make a big and squishy blanket you and your pet will love to snuggle together in this is a corner to corner pattern so you ll need to know how to use the technique to complete the blanket all of the squares are worked on a bias in 2 colors where you increase evenly for the first half of the square and then decrease evenly for the second half the squares are then joined together via their borders adding another avenue of texture and colorful customization make this design in your favorite high contrast color duo and watch it be loved by people and pets alike this pdf includes the print graph written instructions and assembly instructions images of the graphs and the written instructions for seaming are available on divinedebris com 3 the sample in the photos was made in pound of love 4 by lion brand yarn affiliate link check out the kit for this pattern by lby here affiliate link you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos do not create a pattern based on my pattern copyright @ divine debris 2024 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the
